name: Shaman
description: Spiritual intermediaries between the mortal world and the realm of spirits, capable of communing with ancestral forces and elemental powers to heal allies and harm enemies.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers spells and spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per 6 seconds, +3 when near natural elements
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast spells and invoke spiritual powers
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming mana over time
Communing with spirits in natural environments increases mana regeneration rate by 300%
Depleted mana causes penalties to spell effectiveness and spirit connection
Can channel mana into totems and spirit vessels for persistent effects

resource_systems.name: Spirit Attunement
resource_systems.description: Connection to the spirit world that enhances spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when communing with spirits, decreases when spirits are angered
mechanics: Increases by 10 when performing rituals honoring spirits
Increases by 5 per minute when in spiritually significant locations
Decreases by 10 when spirits are disrespected or dismissed
Decreases by 5 per minute when in spiritually corrupted areas
Can be spent to enhance spiritual abilities or summon spirit allies

class_mechanics.name: Spirit Communion
class_mechanics.description: Ability to communicate with and channel the power of spirits
effects: Can see and communicate with spirits invisible to others
Able to channel spirits temporarily for enhanced abilities
Can negotiate with local spirits for information or assistance
Presence soothes angry spirits and helps guide lost ones
Can sense spiritual disturbances and imbalances

class_mechanics.name: Elemental Affinity
class_mechanics.description: Connection to the elemental forces of nature
effects: Can call upon elemental powers for offensive and defensive abilities
Resistance to elemental damage increases near corresponding natural sources
Can sense elemental imbalances and disturbances
Able to temporarily imbue weapons and armor with elemental properties
Presence can calm or intensify natural elemental phenomena

class_mechanics.name: Totem Crafting
class_mechanics.description: Ability to create spiritual focuses that channel specific powers
effects: Can craft totems that provide passive benefits to allies
Totems can be activated for powerful temporary effects
Multiple totems can be maintained simultaneously
Totems act as anchors for spiritual entities and powers
Can sense when totems are disturbed or destroyed

class_mechanics.name: Ancestral Wisdom
class_mechanics.description: Connection to the knowledge and power of ancestors
effects: Can call upon ancestral spirits for guidance and knowledge
Gain insights into historical events and forgotten lore
Ancestral spirits provide protection against spiritual threats
Can channel the skills and abilities of specific ancestors temporarily
Presence strengthens the connection between the living and their ancestors

skill_trees.name: Spirit Speaker
skill_trees.focus: Communication with and manipulation of spirits
key_abilities: Spirit Sight: See and communicate with spirits invisible to others
Spirit Pact: Form temporary alliances with local spirits for assistance
Ancestral Guardian: Summon a protective ancestral spirit

skill_trees.name: Elemental Shaper
key_abilities: Elemental Bolt: Channel pure elemental energy as a ranged attack
Elemental Shield: Create a protective barrier of elemental energy
Elemental Harmony: Gain resistance to all elemental damage

skill_trees.name: Ritual Master
key_abilities: Totem of Protection: Create a totem that shields allies from harm
Healing Ritual: Perform a ceremony that heals allies over time
Spirit Journey: Enter a trance to send your spirit to distant locations

arch_classes.name: SpiritWalker
arch_classes.description: Shamans who have deepened their connection to the spirit world, able to walk between realms and channel greater spiritual powers.

lore: Shamans are the spiritual intermediaries of their communities, maintaining the delicate balance between the mortal world and the realm of spirits. Through rituals, totems, and personal sacrifice, they forge connections with ancestral spirits, elemental forces, and the very essence of nature itself. Their powers are neither arcane like wizards nor divine like clerics, but spiritual—drawing on the ancient bonds between all living things and the unseen forces that permeate the world. Many shamans are called to their path through visions or near-death experiences that open their eyes to the spirit world. Others inherit the mantle from mentors who recognize their innate spiritual sensitivity. Regardless of how they come to their calling, all shamans share a profound respect for the spirits they commune with and a deep understanding of the responsibilities that come with their powers. In battle, shamans are versatile combatants who can heal allies, harm enemies, and control the battlefield through elemental and spiritual forces. Their connection to the elements allows them to adapt to various situations, while their spiritual allies provide unique advantages that conventional magic users cannot match. Though their methods may seem primitive to some, the wisdom and power of shamans have endured for countless generations, proving their effectiveness in maintaining the balance between worlds.
